title: Olive a font like this please?
content:
OK, perhaps I’ll have more luck with this one. Can anyone suggest a font similar to the Olive logo attached please? The challenge is to find one before the guys at Font Shop do, I’ve asked them as well. The race is on!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [olive.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025121101/http:/typophile.com/files/olive.jpg) | 3.93 KB |

 [‹ Arm & Hammer Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025121101/http:/typophile.com/node/50880 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need Some Help On This Slab Serif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025121101/http:/typophile.com/node/50820 "Go to next forum topic")
author: acejet170

comments.content: Nice “find” Nick! I neglected Dartangnon in my reply to Richard which included wild stabs [FF Rattlescript](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025121101/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_rattlescript_1/), [Handsome Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025121101/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/shinntype/handsome_pro_ot/), and [MeMimas](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025121101/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/type_o_tones/memimas_family/).
